item.title: Stock market holiday: Is US stock market closed or open today for Labor Day 2025?

review.headline_rewrite: Stock market holiday: Is US stock market closed or open today for Labor Day 2025?
bullets: In case of a market holiday, the trading session before a scheduled holiday is usually a half-day session.
However, in this case, due to the Saturday and Sunday market closures, there is no half-day trading ahead of a scheduled holiday.
After the stock market holiday on Monday, 1 September 2025 (Labor Day), the benchmark indices will operate as usual till the next scheduled holiday
